title: For Dutch speedskater, age doesn’t matter.
summary_full: Jorrit Bergsma, a gold medalist back in 2014, is now 40. But he rolled back the years to win gold.
summary_public: Jorrit Bergsma, a gold medalist back in 2014, is now 40. But he rolled back the years to win gold.

NL.label: neutral
NL.evidence: For Dutch speedskater, age doesn’t matter.
